QuestData.Title: Front and Center
QuestData.Description:
The runes on that blade... they are the same as the ones etched on the door to the Seat of the Primus.
And one of them just began to glow...
Is this what I think it is, $p? Do you have the means to unseal the Seat?
If so, then perhaps Vyraz's gambit was not for nothing. This could turn the tide of the entire war!
QuestData.LogDescription: Empower the Rune of Might at the Seat of the Primus.
QuestData.RewardText: By blood and thunder, we will crush our foes.
